New Records: James Harden moved into the 19th spot on the NBA's all-time three-point list, passing Kevin Garnett
Key Match Events: The Clippers defeated the Sacramento Kings, extending their undefeated road record and three-game winning streak
Pre-Game Insights: The Clippers aimed to remain undefeated on the road and achieve their first three-game winning streak of the season
Post-Match Reflections: James Harden's performance, despite a dismal shooting percentage, was praised for his ability to carry a major offensive load at 35 years old
Miscellaneous Highlights: Norman Powell has been averaging over 25 points a game on 50% shooting from the field, stepping up in Kawhi Leonard's absence
Others: The Clippers have been a great surprise this season, with multiple players contributing to their success
